question: What is the currency of the United States?
funFact: The dollar is the currency of the United States. The dollar sign ($) is one of the most recognized currency symbols in the world.

funFact: The pound sterling (GBP) is the currency of the United Kingdom. It's one of the oldest currencies still in use, dating back over 1,200 years.
